meanings.definition: Scientists who study ancient human ancestors.
meanings.sent1: Paleoanthropologists carefully examine fossils to learn about early humans.
meanings.sent2: The paleoanthropologists discovered a new species of ancient human.
meanings.sent3: The paleoanthropologists joked that they were like detectives investigating ancient mysteries.
meanings.sent4: In the world of human evolution, paleoanthropologists are like time travelers unraveling the past.
meanings.sent5: The work of paleoanthropologists brings the distant past to life through their discoveries.

meanings.definition: Those who analyze the remains and artifacts of early humans.
meanings.sent1: The paleoanthropologists carefully studied the tools used by early humans.
meanings.sent2: We consulted the paleoanthropologists to understand the significance of the ancient bones.
meanings.sent3: The paleoanthropologists playfully debated about the best way to analyze ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent4: The work of paleoanthropologists is like piecing together a puzzle of our human history.
meanings.sent5: Through their analysis, paleoanthropologists reveal the secrets of our ancestors.

meanings.definition: Experts in the field of human evolution.
meanings.sent1: Paleoanthropologists are highly respected for their knowledge of human evolution.
meanings.sent2: The conference was attended by prominent paleoanthropologists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The paleoanthropologists shared fascinating stories from their research expeditions.
meanings.sent4: To understand human origins, one must turn to the expertise of paleoanthropologists.
meanings.sent5: The groundbreaking discoveries of paleoanthropologists shape our understanding of human development.
